title: Connection timeout after every game.
body:
After every game I've played in the last few days, I'm disconnected from the server once I've hit finished a game and hit continue. I had the same issue a while ago, I'm not sure how long, but the issue resolved itself seemingly, until now where it's begun again. Before roughly five games ago I was taken to the window that's open while the game's running, where it ordinarily says to reconnect, where instead it would say, "Connection Error: The request to the PVP server has timed out. Please login again to continue," or something to that effect. I'd then have to relog after every single game finished, and miss out on the stats screen and seeing what grade I had gotten, which was exceedingly annoying. 

Now it happens that the game finishes, and I'm taken to the normal window that pops up, the client, where it says waiting for stats. However, after a few seconds it stops and the same "Connection Error..." message pops up. 

I've tried repairing the client, I've reinstalled, I've done all these things to Keychain Access, I've prayed to Riot, everything. I'm on Mac OSX El Capitan, and I can't find a fix anywhere online, I look forward to a response.

replies.body: I have the exact same problem. Also using mac. I hope someone will find a solution and post it here. Thanks

This is likely due to a connection issue. Please give the solutions in the Troubleshooting Connection Issues (Mac) article a shot and let me know if that fixes the problem!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac
